Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1968...
Injured on 5/28/1969 with a Tender Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 8/27/1969 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 4/13/1970 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Earned first career win on 4/5/1971...
Had first career hit on 5/10/1971, off Mark Almaraz (DIA)...
Injured on 7/18/1973 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Hit first career homerun on 8/15/1973, off Kenneth Arent (TOL)...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1975, going 4-0, 0.97...
Injured on 4/1/1978 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1980...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1985...
